mapper.select: select a.content_id, a.title, a.addr1, a.first_image, b.bookmarkId, b.userId from attraction_info a, bookmarks b where a.content_id = b.contentId and b.userId = #{userId} order by b.contentId

select i.content_id, i.title, i.addr1, i.addr2, i.first_image, i.sido_code, i.gugun_code, i.latitude, i.longitude, d.overview from attraction_info i, attraction_description d where i.content_id = #{contentId} and i.content_id = d.content_id
